alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 9:24AM MDT until April 24 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Brookings. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, significant amounts of pasture and farm lands begin flooding on the left bank of the river. The road south of the Brookings water treatment plant is flooded, as is 217th Street between 468th and 469th Avenues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CDT Friday was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday evening and continue falling to 8.5 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Sioux River Brookings 9.0 9.2 Fri 9 am 9.1 9.0 8.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 1230 PM CDT.
